comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I wonder why is there such low participation in this simple contest.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on February 14, 2023, 12:37:33 PMI wonder why is there such low participation in this simple contest. Certainly because 4CryptoBetNet is still quite unknown and not many people from here there have an account. Or it's due to the rollover of the prize. That might make it uninteresting for some people, but I can't understand that. Even with the roll over of 15x you can have a lot of fun even if there is no money left to withdraw. Well, I can't think of any other reasons.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: CoinEraser on February 14, 2023, 12:55:55 PMQuote from: libert19 on February 14, 2023, 12:37:33 PMI wonder why is there such low participation in this simple contest. Certainly because 4CryptoBetNet is still quite unknown and not many people from here there have an account. Or it's due to the rollover of the prize. That might make it uninteresting for some people, but I can't understand that. Even with the roll over of 15x you can have a lot of fun even if there is no money left to withdraw. Well, I can't think of any other reasons.  Not only the rollover (which is already kinda ridiculous for a raffle win). I tried to read the terms and it seems you also must have made a deposit at some point. From the beginning this "raffle" seemed a bit off.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 14, 2023, 01:43:01 PMQuote from: CoinEraser on February 14, 2023, 12:55:55 PMQuote from: libert19 on February 14, 2023, 12:37:33 PMI wonder why is there such low participation in this simple contest. Certainly because 4CryptoBetNet is still quite unknown and not many people from here there have an account. Or it's due to the rollover of the prize. That might make it uninteresting for some people, but I can't understand that. Even with the roll over of 15x you can have a lot of fun even if there is no money left to withdraw. Well, I can't think of any other reasons.  Not only the rollover (which is already kinda ridiculous for a raffle win). I tried to read the terms and it seems you also must have made a deposit at some point. From the beginning this "raffle" seemed a bit off.Oh I assumed it was without strings attached bonus, at least for first two ranks. I don't mind rollover as long you can use the bonus to play and neither the deposit requirement as long as any amount counts.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on February 14, 2023, 01:43:01 PMNot only the rollover (which is already kinda ridiculous for a raffle win). I tried to read the terms and it seems you also must have made a deposit at some point. From the beginning this "raffle" seemed a bit off.What really? One deposit! I haven't noticed that until now. Oh man, that makes it very uninteresting. That's a pity.  Thank you for your hint!

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on February 14, 2023, 12:37:33 PMI wonder why is there such low participation in this simple contest. Just take a look at their ToS. They have some ridiculous requirements that make it impossible to win anything. Participating here is a waste of time tbh.- 15x wagering requirement- deposits requiredNo idea why these kind of "giveaways" are even allowed here. They want to lure you on the site to lose money, this doesn't feel like giving back to the community.
